  • bottom - the navigation button arrows are placed below the component.

tags.name: udex-dropdown
tags.description:
Overview

Usage

For the udex-dropdown

ES6 Module Import

import @udex/web-components/dist/Dropdown.js"; --- ### **Events:** - **click-trigger** - Fired event when the user clicks the trigger. - **before-open** - Fired before the dropdown is opened. - **after-open** - Fired after the dropdown is opened. - **before-close** - Fired before the menu is closed. - **after-close** - Fired after the menu is closed. ### **Slots:** - **default** - Defines the content of the Dropdown. - **header** - Defines the header HTML Element. - **footer** - Defines the footer HTML Element. - **trigger** - Defines the trigger HTML Element.

attributes.name: placement-type
attributes.description: Determines on which side the component is placed at.

attributes.name: horizontal-align
attributes.description: Determines the horizontal alignment of the component.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Indicates if the dropdown pane is open

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Allows control over the width.

attributes.name: accessible-name

attributes.name: mode

attributes.name: height

Usage

For the udex-dropdown-list-item

import @udex/web-components/dist/DropdownListItem.js"; --- ### **Events:** - **item-focus** - Fired event when the user click on a dropdown list item. - **item-press** - Fired event when the user focuses on a dropdown list item. ### **Slots:** - **default** - Slot for dropdown list item content.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Defines whether ui5-li is in disabled state.

attributes.name: supporting-text
attributes.description: Defines the supportingText, displayed in the end of the list item.

attributes.name: selected

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: Defines the mode of the item.

attributes.name: end-section
attributes.description: Defines whether a visual separator should be rendered after the item.

attributes.name: indeterminate
attributes.description: Defines whether the selection of a dropdown list is displayed as partially selected.

tags.name: udex-hero-banner
tags.description:
---




### **Slots:**
 - **content** - Slot for primary content.
- **additionalContent** - Slot for any additional content.
- **backgroundPicture** - Slot background picture override.

attributes.name: background-image
attributes.description: Allows control over the background image source.

attributes.name: background-image-loading-strategy
attributes.description: Allows control over the background image loading strategy.

attributes.name: background-image-label
attributes.description: Used as the label for background image.

attributes.name: background-color
attributes.description:
Allows control over the background color.
Value provided should be compatible with standard CSS rendering, e.g:
 - HEX: "#FFF", "#FFFFFF", "FFFFFFFF"
 - RGB/A: "rgb(255, 255, 255)", "rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)"
 - HSL/A: "hsl(0, 100%, 100%)", "hsla(0, 100%, 100%, 1"
 - Variables: "var(--sapShell_Background)", "var(--udexColorNeutralWhite)"
 - Text values: "white", "red"

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Used as the label for background image.

attributes.name: icon-placement
attributes.description: Used as the label for background image.

tags.name: udex-rating-indicator
tags.description:
### Overview

### ES6 Module Import

`import "@ui5/webcomponents/dist/RatingIndicator.js";`


---




### **Events:**
 - **change** - The event is fired when the value changes.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
The indicated value of the rating.

**Note:** If you set a number which is not round, it would be shown as follows:

- 1.0 - 1.2 -> 1
- 1.3 - 1.7 -> 1.5
- 1.8 - 1.9 -> 2

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: The number of displayed rating symbols.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Defines whether the component is disabled.

**Note:** A disabled component is completely noninteractive.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description:
Defines whether the component is read-only.

**Note:** A read-only component is not editable,
but still provides visual feedback upon user interaction.

attributes.name: accessible-name
attributes.description: Defines the accessible ARIA name of the component.

attributes.name: accessible-name-ref
attributes.description: Receives id(or many ids) of the elements that label the component.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Defines whether the component is required.

attributes.name: tooltip
attributes.description: Defines the tooltip of the component.

attributes.name: display
attributes.description: Defines the display type of the component.

attributes.name: total-count
attributes.description: The number of total votes.

tags.name: udex-search
tags.description:
Overview

Usage

For the udex-search

ES6 Module Import

import @udex/web-components/dist/Search.js"; --- ### **Events:** - **submit-search-value** - Fired event when the user submitted the value.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Defines the value of the component.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Defines label text for the input field.

attributes.name: show-reset-button
attributes.description: Defines display the reset button for the search field.

attributes.name: show-submit-button
attributes.description: Defines display the submit button for the search field.

attributes.name: show-voice-button
attributes.description: Defines display the voice button for the search field.

attributes.name: suggestion-list
attributes.description:
Defines suggestions and recommended lists for the component.

Note: Structure of the property: { suggested: ["string", string, ...], recommended: ["string", "string", ...] }

attributes.name: show-suggested-popover
attributes.description: Defines display the suggestion popover in the component.

attributes.name: language-voice
attributes.description: Defines the language of voice search.

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description:
Defines the mode of component.

Note: accepts a string "Standard" or "Home Search".

tags.name: udex-tag
tags.description:
Overview

Usage

For the udex-tag

ES6 Module Import

import @udex/web-components/dist/Tag.js"; --- ### **Events:** - **selectionChange** - Emitted when tag was clicked - **iconClick** - Emitted when icon in tag was clicked

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Defines the text of the tag

attributes.name: design
attributes.description: Defines the design type of tag

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Defines icon name

attributes.name: icon-placement
attributes.description: Defines icon placement if icon was provided

attributes.name: read-only
attributes.description: Defines if tag is in readnly state

attributes.name: accessible-role
attributes.description: Defines the role attribute of component

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Defines whether the component is in disabled state.

Note: A disabled component is completely noninteractive.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
Defines the value of the component.

Note: The property is updated upon typing.

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description:
Sets the maximum number of characters available in the input field.

Note: This property is not compatible with the ui5-input type InputType.Number. If the ui5-input type is set to Number, the maxlength value is ignored.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Defines label text for the input field.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description:
Defines whether the component is read-only.

Note: A read-only component is not editable, but still provides visual feedback upon user interaction.

attributes.name: displayonly
attributes.description:
Defines whether the component is display-only.

Note: A display-only component is not editable, but still provides visual feedback upon user interaction, input border is not visible.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Defines whether the component is required.

attributes.name: value-state
attributes.description: Defines the value state of the component.

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description: Defines direction of the input.

attributes.name: supporting-text
attributes.description: Defines supporting text under the input field.

tags.name: udex-tile
tags.description:
---




### **Slots:**
 - **default** - Defines the content of the component.

attributes.name: hide-shadow
attributes.description: Defines display the shadow for the Tile.

attributes.name: interactive
attributes.description: Defines if the component would be interactive, e.g. gets hover effect, gets focus outline and click event is fired, when pressed.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Defines the component href. This property must only be used when the interactive property is set.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
Defines the component target.

Notes:
  • _self
  • _top
  • _blank
  • _parent
  • _search
This property must only be used when the interactive property is set.

attributes.name: accessible-name
attributes.description: Defines the component aria-label accessibility attribute. This property must only be used when the interactive property is set.
